Class ZArc

java.lang.Object
org.pneditor.petrinet.models.lachguer.souissi.Arc
org.pneditor.petrinet.models.lachguer.souissi.ExArc
org.pneditor.petrinet.models.lachguer.souissi.ZArc
public class ZArc extends ExArc
ZArc class extending ExArc. Represents a special output arc that is only active when the associated place has zero tokens.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    isActive(int token)
    Checks if the arc is active, i.e., if the number of tokens in the place is greater than or equal to the weight of the arc.

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive(int token)
      Description copied from class: ExArc
      Checks if the arc is active, i.e., if the number of tokens in the place is greater than or equal to the weight of the arc.
      Overrides:
      isActive in class ExArc
      Parameters:
      token - The number of tokens in the place.
      Returns:
      True if the place has enough tokens, otherwise false.
